WRITING.TITLE: Ex fianc #233; is sharing a bed with our two daughters and new girlfriend.
WRITING.TEXT: Is co sleeping ok? Him and I broke up 10 months ago. He moved out while I was at work. It was a brake because I was having melt downs over repeatedly dealing with his problem of women. He was staying at his work and said I could trust him there and we would get therapy. That brake turned into a full brake up. He started dating a coworker who worked all summer with him. It #8217;s a small town community. My parents friends ended up telling me, then my cousin. Her told boss. She has not been nice to me at all since end October. He brought her around our two children. And is co sleeping. He belittled me as mother and makes her seem better then me. He did not allow me to have much to do with his son. He #8217;s hardly seen our children for 6 months and now college is out he wants them all the time and won #8217;t see them without her. She just now got ahold of me after all this time and said she only just found out he was engaged. What in the hell?

I just don #8217;t feel it #8217;s a girlfriends place to be in bed with our children. This relationship came about very fast and there are still things to work out such as cutting emotional ties and how to parent them. I feel she should back off of the children. I don #8217;t care he is dating. What has happened to me, may happen with her. I don #8217;t approve of the sleeping thing. I have an older child and no I never did that. Nor would I now. I don #8217;t think it #8217;s right. I #8217;m told I #8217;m being unreasonable.

WRITING.TITLE: Parenting law. Going around child without permission.
WRITING.TEXT: I am the custodial parent. I #8217;m the only parent on my two daughters birth certificates. There father has chosen not to be on them. I #8217;m not sure why really. One daughter is 3, the other is 2. The father sees them about once a week, or less. No support is paid. Him and I were together 5 years before he walked out on my for a much younger coworker. Him and I had a parenting plan before she was in the picture. At first she was around my behind my back. Once she finely spoke with me after 7 months, she claimed she didn #8217;t know he was engaged, and would slow down with the child and not be around them anymore tell the time is right. Since then my wishes have not been respected whatsoever by this women. I have also be told that she and the father share a bed with the children if there is an overnight. I consider this highly inappropriate. Even in the beginning of his and my relationship, his son had his own room and bed. I also had the mother #8217;s permission before meeting the child. He had my sons fathers permission. I #8217;m being told my requests are unreasonable. I #8217;ve been doing my best to fallow unmarried fathers rights for him. But as the sole caretaker/supporter of these two little girls I #8217;m tired of not having my wishes respected my them. This new woman about 8 years younger then us, she #8217;s currently in college to become and elementary teacher. I feel that not my right as there mother are being violated but also I feel the code of ethics for teachers has been violated as well. Above all, teachers must demonstrate integrity, impartiality and ethical behavior in the classroom and in their conduct with parents, coworkers and children. I don #8217;t know really what i should do regarding this. Is it something I can do anything legally about? Or have an officer speak to her about? So the I #8217;ve been told to file child abuse because of the sleeping in bed with my children. Or stop all visits with the father since he isn #8217;t in the birth certificates anyway, and hasn #8217;t done anything to be on them. I just want her to leave my children alone tell things are more settled down and there father and I are on better terms. I #8217;m at my wits end with all of this.

Kindergarten from what I know. I #8217;ve never met her. Really I don #8217;t correct things myself. But I do have a business degree and am a nurse. I own a massage therapy business. So even if they don #8217;t use grammar properly as long as do well in life and don #8217;t pull shit like this I #8217;ll be happy with them.

WRITING.TITLE: Iowa parental rights. Someone who won #8217;t stop coming around child without permission.
WRITING.TEXT: I am the custodial parent. I #8217;m the only parent on my two daughters birth certificates. There father has chosen not to be on them. I #8217;m not sure why really. One daughter is 3, the other is 2. The father sees them about once a week, or less. No support is paid. Him and I were together 5 years before he walked out on my for a much younger coworker. Him and I had a parenting plan before she was in the picture. At first she was around my behind my back. Once she finely spoke with me after 7 months, she claimed she didn #8217;t know he was engaged, and would slow down with the child and not be around them anymore tell the time is right. Since then my wishes have not been respected whatsoever by this women. I have also be told that she and the father share a bed with the children if there is an overnight. I consider this highly inappropriate. Even in the beginning of his and my relationship, his son had his own room and bed. I also had the mother #8217;s permission before meeting the child. He had my sons fathers permission. I #8217;m being told my requests are unreasonable. I #8217;ve been doing my best to fallow unmarried fathers rights for him. But as the sole caretaker/supporter of these two little girls I #8217;m tired of not having my wishes respected my them. This new woman about 8 years younger then us, she #8217;s currently in college to become and elementary teacher. I feel that not my right as there mother are being violated but also I feel the code of ethics for teachers has been violated as well. Above all, teachers must demonstrate integrity, impartiality and ethical behavior in the classroom and in their conduct with parents, coworkers and children. I don #8217;t know really what i should do regarding this. Is it something I can do anything legally about? Or have an officer speak to her about? So the I #8217;ve been told to file child abuse because of the sleeping in bed with my children. Or stop all visits with the father since he isn #8217;t in the birth certificates anyway, and hasn #8217;t done anything to be on them. I just want her to leave my children alone tell things are more settled down and there father and I are on better terms. I #8217;m at my wits end with all of this.

It #8217;s not at all that I don #8217;t like her. I don #8217;t know her. We don #8217;t have a custody agreement. I fully support them in very way shape and form. I #8217;ve given him the paternity affidavits and everything. I #8217;ve done everything to get him on the birth certificates. I #8217;ve even given him Iowa #8217;s cohabitation outline to fill out. It being done behind my back bothers me. Our children didn #8217;t even have time to adjust. In the beginning I asked to please stop and wait a few months. She was around the children right away. One child stopped using the bathroom and went fully back into diapers. I was told by her doctor it was anxiety. She #8217;s just now using the potty. To me, about now is when the girlfriend should be getting to know them. It #8217;s about 8, 9 months in. I #8217;m still letting the children see him. All he does is see them a few hours a week then drops them off anymore.

As for our parenting plan, I have not stopped abiding by it. He has. We agreed on how to handle significant others before we tried for children. Our original agreement says he gets 3 days a week, would help with needs. I agreed no child support would be filed or anything like that. A lawyer told me stop visitation. I don #8217;t think that #8217;s right at all.

We live in Iowa. I have spoke to a lawyer. I was told to stop contact. I have not because that #8217;s fully unfair. I #8217;m not being controlling at all. I want our parenting guidelines to be upheld. And I want my wishes to be respected as there mother. I #8217;m fallowing what we had set. He #8217;s has broken his own agreement. I #8217;m not happy about that. Things need to be consistent. I raise the girls 100% on my own beside when he chooses to see them. So I don #8217;t think I #8217;m being controlling and vindictive by wanting him to stick to our agreement of how we would handle things with our children. If he kept his part like I have, then I wouldn #8217;t be asking any of this in the first place

Trolling? Therapy? What the hell? And no. We had an agreement of trust that was broken. I could post screenshots but that #8217;s against the rules. I #8217;m just trying to find a better solution to this situation?

Trolled? Therapy? What? And he he walked out. There #8217;s more to it. We had a trust agreement. That he broke. I do have screenshots but I don #8217;t post them on here. I #8217;m trying to find a better way to approach this then a big legal mess and or even more drama. To a point why hasn #8217;t he taken the time to be on there birth certificates?

I really don #8217;t think it #8217;s right that everything we agreed to has been broken. We made an agreement to avoid conflict. It #8217;s also not right for me to have all the responsibilities and then be walked all over and disrespected. He doesn #8217;t help with them financially at all. Buy diapers even milk. Anything. I #8217;ve been repeatedly lied to.

Your are right. What #8217;s stopping me is that they both are such daddy #8217;s girls and they have already lost so much time with him, because he was going out of town so much to be with this chick. They are so happy to see him. I really don #8217;t know what to do because I #8217;m fighting a losing battle about being respected as there mother. One thing that really sticks out to me though is I do not want them raised to think that it #8217;s ok to be dishonest,unfaithful and to brake peoples trust.

My son is 13. I Never wanted children again because of how hard pregnancy is on my body due to medical conditions and how fast/painful. My ex husband didn #8217;t help. Years later I got pregnant the first time I had sex with my two daughters father. I miscarried because of having an iud replaced and a midwifes horrible judgement. Down the road we agreed to try. Took us a year to get me pregnant again. 10 years difference, then I got pregnant right away. 11 year difference between oldest and youngest. 13,3,2 are the ages. The girls father ended up walking out on me and was not truthful about why or anything about it. I don #8217;t get child support and there father doesn #8217;t see them unless it works around his new girlfriend he basically left me for. Now my son helps babysit, gets up with them at night if need be. Everything. I #8217;m glad the age gap is so big because of how much help he is. He sees his father and step mother on weekends, his step sister is his age so he gets time to fully be 13 and not have to help with his sisters. Because of the age gap I think the 3 of them will have a closer, better adult life because of there dynamics.

My two daughters father is a non custodial parent. If you don #8217;t have arguments worked out with the courts I have studied up on it. I #8217;ve looked into brith certificates, custody work sheets even to a cohabitation agreement so all party #8217;s are happy. Not one is filled out. Your not rightless but there is more power over you. This is only my situation but who I want around them is always disrespected. I do have legal right to keep them from anyone who comes around them without my permission. I let him do it but don #8217;t clam on taxes unless it #8217;s 100% ok and no worries of court. Protect yourself. Most women suck. If you want I have tons on fathers rights. I #8217;ve watch his son be kept and asked to sign his right away. Never. I saw that pain. If you can get your 50%.

I #8217;m just trying to find out how this would go in court. I don #8217;t believe anything like this should be so difficult since I #8217;m not keeping the kids from there father or his family. Only the new girlfriend who has crossed lines to where I think her being away from them is in there best interest. The father and his family won #8217;t see the children without her or help support them? They say I #8217;m withholding them. I have repeatedly said come get them? But no girlfriend for now. I just want things to be worked out and settled first. This new girlfriend needs to respect boundaries.

Am I braking any laws? What would be the outcome of this, if a judge makes a ruling how would this situation be viewed? I #8217;m not withholding them. So I don #8217;t understand why they don #8217;t see the children without some girlfriend. Why would his mother get a lawyer to see the kids but not for her own son? She can get the children at anytime, she is just refusing not too. I have no idea how this would be viewed
Oh gosh ok

WRITING.TITLE: My home was robbed. Was this broke from the inside or outside?

WRITING.TEXT: Glass was all over my house

WRITING.TITLE: A heart that will never heal. New girlfriend is always thrown in my face.
WRITING.TEXT: It #8217;s almost been a year. Honestly I #8217;m worse. My engagement ring is still on. I cry everyday. He #8217;s all I want. He won #8217;t even look at me when/if he gets our kids. Everything is a nightmare. He wasn #8217;t good to me in our relationship. I took care for him during legal matters. When he was out he would cheat. He would even talk to other girls in front of me. The new girlfriend is a girl he met at the job my father and I got him. I hear about her off and on all last summer. Tell the day he picked a fight and walked out... it was a #8220;brake #8221;. Then the distance started. He even stood me up. He always had to to go the the restaurant for this or that. More and more rudeness. Tell one day he got mad about taxes, then he told me about her in a cruel manor. Everything moved so fast. He just kept saying horrible things. I #8217;m a fat cunt a bad mom everything. Then he got mad again and said he had our children around her behind my back. Anymore he always uses our daughters to hurt me with this new girlfriend. I #8217;ve asked for closure or an explanation. He said I just don #8217;t deserve one. Our relationship was dead? Dead? The night before he left we had sex multiple times and we were finished making honeymoon plans. He was soooo in love. Then next day our relationship was dead? Huh!? I had asked about one girl a few times all summer. But apparently I was delusional as his mother put it. He took a lot of my things he wanted and anything that could be questioned while I was at work. He made me pack up the rest. He made me pack his clothes shoes? Any time we talk it #8217;s my chick this my chick that. Come Christmas a box for him was in my parents trash. My mom already googled it. Moon magic??? He got her a ring. He sent her fucking ring to my parents!! He knows I bring in there mail? He lied to me about it. Said a friend had him get it. Nope. It was for her. Took her 2 months to get a ring. Took me 5 years. What a slap in the face. In February I think I had to work tell 4 Am. I asked him to keep the kids. He couldn #8217;t. He was going to the symphony. I asked him our whole relationship to come with me. I even bought a beautiful white dress. He even yelled at me that he would never go, shut up it wasn #8217;t his thing. Now he #8217;s taking her. Even social media. He #8217;s blasting pictures of her. In almost 8 years only one or two of me.... any boundaries we had set for our children are violated. She said to me the only time she cares to even talk to me, she didn #8217;t know he was engaged? In a small town...at a gossipy mom and pop shop???? Bullshit. I heard about this chick before he left me. He most definitely had been cheating but both can #8217;t admit it. To this day he still is ghosting me. If she isn #8217;t around he won #8217;t see his kids. He doesn #8217;t support them. He wont do anything. He treats me like a one night stand not his ex fianc #233;. Even his family acts different. Everyone treats her better. I #8217;m accused of keeping the kids from him. I #8217;ve said repeatedly I #8217;m not keeping the kids, come get them. But since I tried all summer to find a middle ground and both didn #8217;t work with me. This new girlfriend doesn #8217;t need to be around the kids tell we have a middle ground because this back and forth is stupid. She #8217;s the only issue anyway? We should be able to parent without her needing an opinion or anything else. I #8217;ve even been told how he will discuss things about our children with her? Excuse me? I don #8217;t remember her being in bed with us when we made the kids? Or in the room when I delivered them? Last I knew she has not legal right to the children? The children are not her business. It #8217;s to where his own mom says she will get a lawyer because I #8217;m keeping them? Mind you she won #8217;t babysit, she didn #8217;t help me pay for her own sons lawyer but now she #8217;s going too? When all she #8217;s got to do is drive 2 minutes and she #8217;s here? It #8217;s just not fair. Not at all. I was not treated that way with his son? I was word for word told to not fucking worry about his son. This all sucks. What sucks more is how much I still love him. I hate wondering why I wasn #8217;t good enough. Why he hates me. If he was just so unhappy why didn #8217;t he tell me instead of ghosting me? Is he truly that happy or for whatever reason likes to hurt me? After all this time together, everything together. He can #8217;t even look at me now.i feel so used. I don #8217;t know why he was even with me. He will never give me answers, and it just brakes my heart because I did whatever he asked or needed. Now he says we have nothing to talk about? How? We have a lot to talk over. He #8217;s so busy making me the bad guy and worried about this chick he doesn #8217;t even say hey how are the kids. It makes me think everyone would be happy if I just disappeared. New mommy is perfect. I #8217;m so crushed. Why couldn #8217;t it be me? Everything I ever wanted she is getting. I trusted him. I love him. And she doesn #8217;t give to fucks. I view her has a monster for what has happened. For her actions in this. I just keep having brake downs. Nothing gets better. Ever. During all this my home was even robbed. I #8217;ve lost everything. Depression isn #8217;t even the right word for the pain anymore. I #8217;m a person who hates being touched. This man is the Only one I #8217;ve ever had touch me and be perfectly fine with. No anxiety. I reached out the other day trying to talk to him. He shut that down fast. If he just said it #8217;s going to be alright I would have felt so much better. Not one comforting word. Just kicked down more. Someone who was going to be his wife, he can #8217;t even say a kind word too. I would give anything to cuddle up and fall asleep hearing his heartbeat again. That #8217;s gone forever now. He hates me and is never coming home.. I build my life around him. I #8217;m devoted to him. I can pray and pray but he #8217;s gone. I don #8217;t understand asking me to marry him or our children if this is it. Knowing I #8217;ll never feel his warmth or arms around me again kills me. Im never going to be the same again. I trusted him. I love him. He #8217;s my soulmate, my world. A life without him seems horrible. But it #8217;s my future.
My house sitter is gone, and his story is off. So I was wondering about this.
I posted this on another site and everyone asked me why glass #8217;s was on the outside the way it is.

WRITING.TITLE: Help
WRITING.TEXT: I have nothing right now. I have 24 cents in my bank. My home was robbed. I miss work because I had manic episodes. My kids dad bounced my bank. I #8217;m so fucked. I need help so badly.

WRITING.TITLE: I have too much and lost it. He was my only relief from my anxiety. *dont use or ghost people who genuinely love you*
WRITING.TEXT: He #8217;s gone. He #8217;s never going to hold me again. He will never love me again if he ever did at all. I did so much. Gave so much. I have him all of me. He made me feel normal. Made the screaming in my mind stop when he held me. We agreed to help each other. He #8217;s doing so well now. I #8217;m just an empty shell. Up until the last month or so I #8217;ve hid how sick really am. I #8217;ve known once our last child was born. I almost bled out. Sometimes I can #8217;t even walk and I don #8217;t even have him to take my hand. I messaged him the other day. All he said was he won #8217;t talk to me unless it #8217;s about our children. He won #8217;t even see his children anymore basically. I #8217;m sick sad and alone. He promised he would take care of me. I trusted him. He took everything I had to give and left. I don #8217;t even know why. Crying while shivering from my medicine wishing he was here. But he will never be again. No one deserves this pain or loneliness.
I have. It hasn #8217;t got anywhere.

It #8217;s just bad business. Bad ethics. On a side note there #8217;s always complications. At 17 I was fired for it. A year ago my fianc #233; ghosted me his coworker. Deep story with that but I should have been able to trust him at work or all places. It just doesn #8217;t mix well somewhere.

WRITING.TITLE: PayPal 50 for kids
WRITING.TEXT: I have to by diapers,milk and a small amount of food to hold is over tell Friday. I #8217;m on medical leave and can #8217;t work tell Friday. I #8217;ve tried the kids father and everything. He didn #8217;t even drop off diapers. I can pay the money back Thursday

I feel the same way all the time. Mostly because i think if i just went away everyone would have what they want. All I want to do is feel sharp glide. Seeing the blood let me know I was alive. If I get hurt or if I were to cut myself I could bleed out right now. I #8217;m sorry you feel this way too. Only one other ever knew what this was like. I devoted my life to that person and they left me. I spend my birthday last month crying in bed because I wanted to hurt myself. All I needed for that person to tell me everything will be ok but he won #8217;t talk to me really. I don #8217;t want to hurt anymore. I don #8217;t want to see them giving someone else everything I wanted. It #8217;s a day to day struggle for me as well. I feel your pain and i hope you are able to heal and find the person who will take the pain away like mine did at one point. You deserve to be happy and not feel this way. No one should feel this much pain and so alone. I know I #8217;ll be alone. He #8217;s gone and isn #8217;t coming home this time. I hope you never have that. Best wishes and pray someday you can wake up each day to someone and know you will never have to face any kind of pain alone. #10084; #65039;
